origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'SwissCentralBankAPI.get_policy_statement', 'description': 'This function retrieves the latest monetary policy statement from the Swiss National Bank in the specified language.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'language', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The language in which the policy statement is to be retrieved.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'statement', 'description': 'The latest monetary policy statement from the Swiss National Bank.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 SwissCentralBankAPI.get_policy_statement, 它的参数输入如下: 'language'是'English'.
